examples: Can you check the status of my order?
I'm waiting for my delivery, can you provide an update?
I'm having trouble logging into my account.
My payment isn't going through, what should I do?
The website is displaying an error message, can you help?
What are the features of your latest product?
Tell me about your pricing plans.
Do you offer any discounts on your products?
Can I speak to a human agent?
I need to talk to someone.
Transfer me to a representative, please.
